title: Rads Error Season 7
body:
Hey i played League of Legends yesterday... and today i having the Rads error.. i tried everyting and still don't work
plz help me to solve it..

replies.body: Is this happening when trying to launch the client?  This specific error usually happens when League doesn't have permission to perform a function or read game files.  My suggestion for you would be to run through each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that access is being allowed.  Let me know if you have any questions!
